episodes.title: A New Age Cult in a Gilded Age Mansion: Father Divine's Woodmont
episodes.description:
Step inside Woodmont, a French Gothic Revival château built in the 1890s for industrialist Alan Wood Jr., and later transformed into the headquarters of Father Divine and the International Peace Mission. This episode of This House traces the unlikely convergence of Gilded Age opulence and a utopian religious movement: from Father Divine’s early preaching and the 1931 Sayville raid, to Harlem’s free “Holy Communion” banquets, the 1953 move to Woodmont, and the estate’s preservation today.
